submissions.content: I made a star mobile for my room! It has all the colors of the rainbow and sparkles in the light.

submissions.author: Noah
submissions.content: I learned about dolphins and wrote a poem about them. They're my favorite animal now! Silver laughter in the sea, Dolphins dance where waves run free. Moonlight hums their secret song, Joy swims softly all day long.
